event.title: the completion of Mr Wiles's one year

data.event: The flight, which was piloted by Marshall executive Terry Holloway, also marked the completion of Mr Wiles's one year of training as an aircraft fitter after working for 29 years in the company's vehicle division.
Mr Wiles, from Cherry Hinton, said: "It was a real day to remember and an experience I shall remember for a very long time.
